de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.writer.xml

Class LMFXmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.writer.LMFWriter
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.lmf.writer.xml.LMFXmlWriter

  • public class LMFXmlWriter
extends LMFWriter
    This class writes a LMF classes to XML Output Stream.

    • Constructor Summary
